text: Antonio Henares Sierra (born November 21, 1956 in MÃ¡laga) is a wheelchair basketball athlete from Spain. He has a physical disability: he is 4 point wheelchair basketball player. He played wheelchair basketball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. They beat the United States 66-60 to finish third. == References == Category:Living people Category:1956 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Spanish wheelchair basketball players Category:4 point player Category:People from Malaga
